My personal favorite original CS games, it has the 2nd most active player base out of the original 3 counter strikes, and source pretty much includes everything that the other ones have. And this counter strike introduced surfing into the counter strike community, and the classic ‚Äúdoor stuck‚Äù meme came from this game. Cult classic
wykurwista gra i fajne mody polecam cieplutko üòéü§ô

In my opinion the best Counter Strike game in the series, even better than Global Offensive. The only downside is the traditional gameplay of defusing a bomb or rescuing hostages gets old and boring fast, you've got to play the various servers with other game mods like Zombies, Surfing, and more. Thats where the game is much more enjoyable, if you know what you're doing. I personally dislike the fact you cant respawn immediately after being dead, but you can play on various Deathmatch servers if you want to respawn immediately. On servers where you dont, I personally really disliked the fact you must watch others playing and have to wait for them to finish the game. It can be easy to die sometimes, even in the beginning of a round, that can piss you off pretty easily(atleast for me). However, on various deathmatch servers and the like I enjoyed the game very much.
